1260480.name: Grab the Beat
1260480.description:
Hello, everyone!
Unfortunately, Grab the Beat will be shutting down within October.
We sincerely thank you for loving our game.
We'll see you with a better game in the future.
Thank you.
G1 Playground

Dancing is so easy!

Are you afraid to dance?
Don`t worry. If you just follow the dancer in front of you, you will soon become a dance master.

Game Features
1. Anyone can enjoy easily!
If you move along only the nodes, your whole body will naturally move. It's so easy!

2. Exciting music and mood
Concert halls, clubs, and alleys. Challenge your dancing skills with exciting songs in an exciting locations!

3. Just enjoy! So blow away your stress!
As you dance, you will find yourself laughing. Just enjoy!
